City Secretary / Human Resources Director
=========================================

* City Secretary / HR Director



Kristen Hetzel began employment as the Shavano Park's City Secretary / Human Resources Director in May 2023.  She was previously the Human Resources Manager for the City of Cibolo.  She has considerable experience in municipal government. She is a Texas Registered Municipal Clerk (TRMC), a Certified Public Manager (CPM), and holds a variety of Human Resources certifications (PHR, SHRM-CP, PSHRA-SCP). In her free time, she enjoys time with her daughter and pets.

If you have questions for the City Secretary, please email her at
[citysecretary@shavanopark.org](mailto:citysecretary@shavanopark.org)
.
The position of City Secretary is a statutory position required by State law and City Ordinance. The City Secretary is hired by the City Manager and provides administrative support to the City Council and City Manager.  In addition, the City Secretary also serves as the City’s Records Management Officer for the preservation of official records.
**Other duties of the City Secretary include:**

* Preparation of minutes for all regular and special City Council and Boards/Commission Meetings
* Coordination of City’s special events
* Provides customer services to citizens and visitors to City Hall Services
